bioAsHtml: Core member of the Grails development team, Jeff Scott Brown, is a Principal Engineer with Object Computing Inc. Jeff has been involved in designing and building object oriented systems for almost 20 years. Jeff's areas of expertise include web development with Groovy & Grails, Java and agile development.
